dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2840 IH: To prohibit any appropriation of funds for the Science and Technology account of the Environmental Protection Agency.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To prohibit any appropriation of funds for the Science and Technology account of the Environmental Protection Agency.

section.text: No funds are authorized to be appropriated for the Science and Technology account of the Environmental Protection Agency.
